meanings.definition: A substance enclosed under pressure and released as a fine spray.
meanings.sent1: I used an aerosol to spray paint the walls.
meanings.sent2: The aerosol can hissed as I sprayed it on the plants.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat played with the aerosol, creating a colorful mess.
meanings.sent4: Her words hung in the air like an aerosol, leaving a lingering impact.
meanings.sent5: The aerosol mist danced in the sunlight, creating a magical effect.

meanings.sent1: I grabbed the aerosol to freshen up the room.
meanings.sent2: The aerosol container was almost empty, so I bought a new one.
meanings.sent3: The curious toddler mistook the aerosol for a toy and tried to play with it.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like an aerosol, full of ideas waiting to be released.
meanings.sent5: The shiny aerosol gleamed on the shelf, catching my eye.
